==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Macacoz:''' Please stand back, friend! If you wander on stage during the wrestling match, there's a good chance you'll be hurt!
:{{DIcon}} Are you the referee?
::'''Macacoz:''' I sure am, friend! If you want to get up on stage for a challenge, you'll need to register first!
:{{DIcon}} I'll leave you to it, then.
::'''Macacoz:''' Alright, enjoy the show!
{{Dialogue End}}
